title: Hannibus

properties.name: description
properties.value: Hannibus was a dragon rider, who served Zaros near the end of the Second Age. When Zaros was betrayed by his general Zamorak, some of the dragon riders remained loyal to Zaros, while others joined Zamorak's rebellion. Hannibus, however tried to remain neutral, by not declaring loyalty to either faction.  [1]

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Hannibus

Hannibus was a dragon rider, who served Zaros near the end of the Second Age. When Zaros was betrayed by his general Zamorak, some of the dragon riders remained loyal to Zaros, while others joined Zamorak's rebellion. Hannibus, however tried to remain neutral, by not declaring loyalty to either faction. [1]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Ablenkian, "Ablenkian's escape", Old School RuneScape. "I did not betray our lord like Apropos did, nor did I cowardly sit on the fence like Hannibus."
